verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֨ת <S%H8141><s%> year שְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirtieth וָשֵׁשׁ֙ <S%H8337><s%> In the six לְמַלְכ֣וּת <S%H4438><s%> of the reign אָסָ֔א <S%H609><s%> of Asa עָלָ֞ה <S%H5927><s%> came up בַּעְשָׁ֤א <S%H1201><s%> Baasha מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> against Judah וַיִּ֖בֶן <S%H1129><s%> and built אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרָמָ֑ה <S%H7414><s%> Ramah לְבִלְתִּ֗י <S%H1115><s%> to the intent that תֵּ֚ת <S%H5414><s%> he might let יוֹצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> none go out וָבָ֔א <S%H935><s%> or come in לְאָסָ֖א <S%H609><s%> to Asa מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

בְּרִית֙ <S%H1285><s%> [There is] a league בֵּינִ֣י <S%H996><s%> between וּבֵינֶ֔ךָ <S%H996><s%> and me between וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> and me between אָבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> between me and thee as [there was] between my father וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> and me between אָבִ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> and thy father הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold שָׁלַ֤חְתִּֽי <S%H7971><s%> behold I have sent לְךָ֙ כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> thee silver וְזָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> and gold לֵ֞ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go הָפֵ֣ר <S%H6565><s%> break בְּרִֽיתְךָ֗ <S%H1285><s%> thy league אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with בַּעְשָׁא֙ <S%H1201><s%> with Baasha מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְיַעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> that he may depart מֵעָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיִּשְׁמַ֨ע <S%H8085><s%> hearkened בֶּן הֲדַ֜ד <S%H1130><s%> And Benhadad אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto king אָסָ֗א <S%H609><s%> Asa וַ֠יִּשְׁלַח <S%H7971><s%> and sent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׂרֵ֨י <S%H8269><s%> the captains הַחֲיָלִ֤ים <S%H2428><s%> of his armies אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לוֹ֙ אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> against the cities יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיַּכּוּ֙ <S%H5221><s%> and they smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עִיּ֣וֹן <S%H5859><s%> Ijon וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּ֔ן <S%H1835><s%> and Dan וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> אָבֵ֣ל מָ֑יִם <S%H66><s%> and Abelmaim וְאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מִסְכְּנ֖וֹת <S%H4543><s%> and all the store עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> cities נַפְתָּלִֽי׃ <S%H5321><s%> of Naphtali

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> heard בַּעְשָׁ֔א <S%H1201><s%> And it came to pass when Baasha וַיֶּחְדַּ֕ל <S%H2308><s%> [it] that he left off מִבְּנ֖וֹת <S%H1129><s%> building אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרָמָ֑ה <S%H7414><s%> of Ramah וַיַּשְׁבֵּ֖ת <S%H7673><s%> cease אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְלַאכְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H4399><s%> and let his work ס

וְאָסָ֣א <S%H609><s%> Then Asa הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king לָקַח֙ <S%H3947><s%> took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> all Judah וַיִּשְׂא֞וּ <S%H5375><s%> and they carried away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַבְנֵ֤י <S%H68><s%> the stones הָֽרָמָה֙ <S%H7414><s%> of Ramah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵצֶ֔יהָ <S%H6086><s%> and the timber אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בָּנָ֖ה <S%H1129><s%> was building בַּעְשָׁ֑א <S%H1201><s%> thereof wherewith Baasha וַיִּ֣בֶן <S%H1129><s%> and he built בָּהֶ֔ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גֶּ֖בַע <S%H1387><s%> therewith Geba וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <S%H4709><s%> and Mizpah ס

וּבָעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> And at that time הַהִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> he בָּ֚א <S%H935><s%> came חֲנָ֣נִי <S%H2607><s%> Hanani הָרֹאֶ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> the seer אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אָסָ֖א <S%H609><s%> to Asa מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him בְּהִשָּׁ֨עֶנְךָ֜ <S%H8172><s%> unto him Because thou hast relied עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> on the king אֲרָם֙ <S%H758><s%> of Syria וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not נִשְׁעַ֙נְתָּ֙ <S%H8172><s%> and not relied עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that נִמְלַ֛ט <S%H4422><s%> escaped חֵ֥יל <S%H2426><s%> army מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of the king אֲרָ֖ם <S%H758><s%> of Syria מִיָּדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> out of thine hand
